title: Home
content:
# About Me

In 2010, I left my hometown Gdynia, the seacoast of Poland, to find a new challenge. Currently, I am living in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. I used to work in the fashion industry, but a few years ago I decided to change direction and become a developer. 

Currently, I am working full time as a front-end developer at Zoover B.V., a Dutch website that focuses on collecting and sharing reviews about holiday destinations. 

I love using the following technologies (not all necessarily in the same project :) :

* Typescript
* React
* Angular
* RxJS
* GraphQL
* Sass

When I am not coding, I love to listen to tech and science podcasts, lose myself in an audiobook (mostly science fiction).

_(Just FYI: I just started working on this version of the page, still in progress!)_
